title: NewsBreak: HK Leader Lam Pulls Extradition Bill - Report
text:
NewsBreak: HK Leader Lam Pulls Extradition Bill - Report

Global 1 hour ago (Oct 23, 2019 09:25)

© Reuters. Investing.com -- Carrie Lam, the embattled leader of Hong Kong's legislature, has formally withdrawn a controversial bill that would have allowed criminal suspects to be extradited to mainland China, Reuters reported. The news comes on the same day that the Financial Times reported that Beijing is looking to replace Lam as leader of the legislative council, unhappy at her handling of over four months of often violent protests.

NewsBreak: HK Leader Lam Pulls Extradition Bill - Report
